No. . . They're just missing in action.
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/halo/images/7/76/HReach-B312NobleSix.png/revision/latest?cb=20121216170730&path-prefix=es

_**Noble V: Jorge.** Explosives expert who enjoys big weapons and even bigger explosions for his enemies..._
> _**Died with a "bang" to protect all those he loved, a big man who's more "teddy" than "bear" than you'd believe.**_

_**Noble II: Kat.** The brains of the group, the leading thought of the plans that Noble conspires..._
> _**Was shot in the head, outflanked by an enemy who she had no knowledge of at the time in the blaze of Glass that held.**_

_**Noble III: Jun.** Ranged specialist, sniper at heart... Loved the silence only when needed..._
> _**... He was never heard of... Ever again... Protecting something... Even more silent...**_

_**Noble I: Carter.** The captain of the crew, the final judgement of the call, the Leader of Nobility..._
> _**He went down with his ship, his last judgement his own upon himself for others, his last act of nobility.**_

_**Noble IV: Emile.** Oh, he loved his sharp objects and even sharper, more thoughtful, fun hunts..._
> _**Was stabbed through the back. His hunt paid off with a bit of fun, still, at least.**_

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_**Noble VI: The Lone Wolf.**_
> _**Died alone.**_

Obligatory TF quote that has nothing to do with the original quote.

"Damn it... So even THAT power... It wasn't enough...? Heh... Heheheh... If you... If you think I'm gonna give up hope, you're wrong. Cause I've... Got my friends behind me. Alphys told me that she would watch me fight you... And if anything went wrong, she would... evacuate everyone. By now she's called ASGORE and told him to absorb the 6 human SOULs. And with that power... This world will live on...!"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AyRtZ590E8A

Strange my reaction is quite the opposite
http://gif.mocksession.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/LOW-CELEBRATION.gif

"Hey guys... if you're hearing this then it means you did it. You won. You kicked the shit out of Hargrove's forces. I knew you could. But this is my last stop. See, when I came into this world, I was really just a collection of somebody else's memories. But with your help, these memories... they-they took form! They became my voice, my personality. And, after a while, I... I began to make brand new memories of my own. All of these things are what make me who I am... but they're also holding me back. I can't run this suit as Epsilon, but if I erase my memories, if I... deconstruct myself, the fragments I'll leave behind will have the strength to get you through this. I believe that.  wish that there was another way. But I’m leaving this message, as well as others, in the hopes that you'll understand why I have to go this time...hehe, it was actually Doyle who made me realize something that I've never thought of before. There are so many stories where some brave hero decides to give their life to save the day, and because of their sacrifice, the good guys win, the survivors all cheer, and everybody lives happily ever after. But the hero... never gets to see that ending. They'll never know if their sacrifice actually made a difference. They'll never know if the day was really saved. In the end, they just have to have faith. "
 
"Ain't that a bitch."
I don't know the reference, but that's really sad and I really like it.
